title: FernGully: the Last rainforest (Captioned)
creator_credit: Bill Kroyer, Peter Faiman, Wayne Young, Youngheart Productions and FAI Films
brief_description: Dedicated to “our children and our children’s children”, the magical, mystical world of Fern Gully, the last rainforest takes us to a secret, special place filled with wonder and adventure where human beings exist only in fairy tales! Human hero Zak, shrunk to fairy size by Crysta, joins Batty Koda, an escapee from human lab and the denizens of the forest as they struggle to save the future of the forest from the evil enemy Hexxus. Voices include Tim Curry, Christian Slater and Robin Williams.
